title: Broken
description: *** This is the first book in the Broken Trilogy and it ends with a cliffhanger. Intended for 18+.***My name is Savannah Miller. Right after my twenty-seventh birthday, I was taken from everything I’d ever known. I was beaten, starved, treated like an animal. With no sense of time and no dignity left, I finally gave up hope.Then one night, an elite group of US Army soldiers came to my rescue. I was brought to a safe house and given two stay under their protection and follow their rules or leave and be guaranteed to be returned to the savages within a week.I chose option one.With the help of new friends and a potential new love, I fight to get my life back. This is my story…
author: J.L. Drake
